FAQ

The set time has passed, but I haven't received the invoice — what should I do?

Check your email inbox and spam folder. If nothing arrives within 15-30 minutes, contact the seller's support team. If you purchased through a third-party site, Netflix won't send the invoice directly — only the seller will.

Can I change my Netflix account email and password after purchase?

Yes, if you’ve been given full access to the account. Go to Netflix settings → Account → Change email or password. If the account is shared or restricted, changes may be blocked. Always confirm this before buying

Can I add a phone number for password recovery?

Yes, if you have full account access. Log into your account → Add phone number → Verify via SMS. This helps you recover access if you lose your password.

How soon will I receive the account information I ordered?

Usually within a few minutes after payment. If it’s automated, the email arrives instantly. If manual, it may take up to 30 minutes. If it’s delayed longer, contact the seller.

How to pay?

Payment options we currently have: PayPal, Bitcoin.
